dublin_core.dcvalue: Experience from other fields of internal medicine shows that Internet based technology can be used to monitor various diseases The new technology handles complex calculation programs easily and it is a unique way of communicating These advantages might be used in optimizing the treatment for asthmatic subjects because undertreatment is a common problem found in European asthmatic subjects
The Journal of allergy and clinical immunology
Internet-based monitoring of asthma: a long-term, randomized clinical study of 300 asthmatic subjects.
